testAssociateServersWithOperationMultipleSets

public void testAssociateServersWithOperationMultipleSets()
                                                   throws java.lang.Exception
This test should ensure that if the associate method is called with two sets that may both contain one or more of the same server, only one entry is made for the server.

The driving use case behind this is the scenario where a server is subscribed to one channel and unsubscribed from another in the same SSM batch task.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if there is an error running the test

testAssociateServersWithOperationDuplicateServer

public void testAssociateServersWithOperationDuplicateServer()
                                                      throws java.lang.Exception
This test should ensure that only one association is created a single set references the same server more than once (this could occur if the second element in the set differs).

The driving use case behind this is the scenario where a server is subscribed to two different channels in the same SSM batch task.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if there is an error running the test
